docs.snippet: The surprise attack launched against the Republic of Korea in the early morning of June 25 by the Communist regime in North Korea was a brutal blow to the peace of the world. It was directed against a peaceful people ruled by an independent...
docs.lead_paragraph: The surprise attack launched against the Republic of Korea in the early morning of June 25 by the Communist regime in North Korea was a brutal blow to the peace of the world. It was directed against a peaceful people ruled by an independent government of their own choosing, brought into being with the participation of the United Nations, and recognized by the majority of the free nations of the world.
